goal.ch: 本課程目標為藉由學習基礎海洋地物探勘技術，如多音束水深、海床測繪、側掃聲納、海上震測、磁力重力、地熱等基本原理，並學習相關現今於綠能、地質災害與構造調查研究。
goal.en: This course aims to let student learning basical marine geophysical investigations such as multi-beam echo sounder, sea bed mapping, side-scan sonar, multi-channel seismic, magnetic/gravity and geo-thermal basic principals. This course also introduce marine geophysical investigations on green energy, geo-hazard and tectonic studies applications.

outline.ch:
1. 海洋測繪技術基礎
2. 海洋震測基礎
3. 海洋重力與磁力基礎
4. 海洋地熱探測基礎
5. 海洋綠能與地質災害應用
outline.en:
1. Fundamantals on marine mapping
2. Fundamantals on marine seismic explorations
3. Fundamantals on marine gravity＆magnetic explorations
4. Fundamantals on marine geo-thermal explorations
5. Marine green enrgy and geo-hazard Applications

textbook.ch: Marine Geophysics, 1999, authored by E. J. W. Jones, 466 pages.
textbook.en: Marine Geophysics, 1999, authored by E. J. W. Jones, 466 pages.

gradMethod.ch:
平時成績 (30％)
期中考 (30％)
期末考 (40％)
gradMethod.en:
Attendancy and Class performance (30％)
Mid-term (30％)
Final Exam (40％)

flexDiscription.en: Industrial Visit may be arranged in Week 17 or Week 18
